ing: 1 (15.5 ounce) can RED GOLDÂ® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Lime Juice & Cilantro
Salt and black pepper to taste
des: "A fresh, homemade dip recipe that doesn't get any easier! Our Petite Diced Tomatoes with Lime Juice & Cilantro are added to ripe avocados, along with more lime juice and a pinch of salt. That's all it takes for this quick Mexican dip!"
ins:
In a medium bowl mash the avocados with a fork until chunky.  Stir in remaining ingredients until well blended.  Serve at room temperature.
Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro
